short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Display key press on web page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is open source. See: https://github.com/eyebrowkang/key-display

Elevate your presentations, tutorials, and live coding sessions with the Key Display Chrome Extension. This innovative tool is designed to enhance online communication and learning by displaying real-time keystrokes directly on your web page. Whether you're a professional educator, a developer, or just someone looking to share your skills online, this extension makes it easier than ever to follow along with any keyboard-based activity.

Features:

Real-Time Display: Every key press is shown on the web page in real time, allowing viewers to see exactly what keys are being pressed without delay. This includes letters, numbers, function keys, and special characters, ensuring comprehensive coverage of all keyboard activities.
Easy Toggle On/Off: A simple toggle feature allows you to turn the keystroke display on or off as needed, providing flexibility during presentations or when switching between tasks that require different levels of visibility.
Highly Configurable: You can config the timeout, uppercase letter and many other items

Use Cases:

Educational Tutorials: Enhance your online tutorials by showing viewers exactly what keys you press during software demonstrations or when teaching coding lessons.
Live Coding Streams: Share your coding process more transparently with live audiences, making it easier for viewers to follow along and understand your keystroke choices.
Presentations: Add a professional touch to your online presentations by seamlessly integrating real-time keystroke visibility, aiding in the explanation of workflows or software usage.

Getting Started:

Installation is quick and easy, directly from the Chrome Web Store. Once installed, simply activate the extension from your browser toolbar to start displaying keystrokes on any web page. Dive into the settings to customize the appearance and behavior of the keystroke display to suit your specific needs and preferences.

Enhance your online interactions and educational content with the Key Display Chrome Extension, the ultimate tool for bringing clarity and engagement to your keyboard-based activities.
